p: Dried PB larvae were purchased in medicinal markets from commercial suppliers (Kwang Myung Dang Co., Ulsan, Korea). The identity of the samples (manufacturerâ€™s No. K2281201707) was macroscopically confirmed and then deposited in the Korean Herbarium of Standard Herbal Resources (Index Herbariorum code KIOM) at KIOM, Naju, Korea (medicinal ID: 2-18-0111).
